query:
INSERT INTO edge_repo_assignments
                (edge_node_id, repository_id, sync_enabled, priority_override, replication_schedule)
            VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4, $5)
            ON CONFLICT (edge_node_id, repository_id) DO UPDATE SET
                sync_enabled = $3,
                priority_override = $4,
                replication_schedule = $5
